name: From Darkness To Brightness
description:
A downloadable demo for Windows

The game was created during a 6 weeks work project included in a training given at "Technocité Mons" in Belgium.

In a world where little creatures fear the light, your tribe sends you to fill the hole creating a destructive ray threatening the existence of your village.

Join forces with your companion and use the light to reach your goal.

GAME FEATURES

  • System of light reflexion
  • fantastic underground universe
  • Interaction with  mirror creature

CONTROLS

- Using Controller -
